explanation: The 'home' function serves as the main entry point for the application.
It is decorated with a route that maps to the root URL ('/').
The function renders the 'index.html' template when accessed.
response.hook: Explore the entry point of your application.
response.pitfall: Ensure that the 'index.html' template exists to avoid rendering errors.
response.title: Home Route Function
response.why_it_matters: Understanding the home function is crucial for grasping how your application handles requests at the root URL.
